title: Charger
desc:
Post 56
 - Pick between one of these effects:
 - Lose all of your items; Refill to (amount of items + 1) <:charge:1240849067362488403>. This will induce <:ghost_charge:1240975548331720734> if health maxes.
 - Lose as many <:charge:1240849067362488403> as you want, pick an item; that item becomes **Permanent**, but will be lost after (<:charge:1240849067362488403> lost / 2) reloads.
